title: Happy Mother's Day to all the incredible mothers out there! ✨🏆
text: We want to take a moment to appreciate and celebrate the amazing mothers among us at Team CNW, as well as our female tradies 🙌 We wish you a wonderful Mother's Day full of love, laughter and appreciation. You truly are superheroes! 🦹

title: Welcome Justin Brumfield to the CNW Electrical Hall Of Fame 🥳
text: In his spare time, Justin, is a national car racing champion (three times Northern Territory champion to be exact, but who's counting 🥇🥇🥇) We'd like to take this opportunity to thank Justin for his hard work and dedication, congratulations on your ten year milestone, what an achievement!  👏👏

title: 🚨SPARKYS!! - CNW GIVEAWAY ROUND 3🚨
text: We’re on the FINAL Month of this giveaway. If you missed out on the first one heres your chance to re enter!
